column4: hey, i'm having a few issues with named on Hardy. it's crashing with an "assertion failed" message dumped to daemon.log
Jan 27 14:50:49 apollo named[30349]: adb.c:920: INSIST((((namehook) != ((void *)0)) && (((const isc__magic_t *)(namehook))->magic == ((('a') << 24 | ('d') << 16 | ('N') << 8 | ('H')))))) failed
Jan 27 14:50:49 apollo named[30349]: exiting (due to assertion failure)
